content.detailedDescription: It was about 9:42pm to about 9:45pm may 24, 2015. section 303 row 21 seat 12 in petco park. something green caught my eye. it was likely miles away. it looked like it was about the size of a large star. from what i could see it looked grey and it was wider than it was tall. i couldn't make out an exact shape or color due to the night's sky and i have excellent eye sight. it started about 22 degrees north. the light was singular and it didn't blink a single time. it began to head west. as it did so it began to slowly curve upwards. then it slowed down and shot upwards and back down about 10 to 15 degrees and shot back down within 2 seconds. it continued to the west. once it reached about 0 degrees north it instantly turned back around to the east without stopping or slowing down. at about 5 degrees north it shot upward and back down in a similar way and about the same height as the time before, but this time it didn't slow down before going upward. it then went east until it was out of sight. before and after i had seen several airplanes land, but only after the event did i see helicopters. i personally have never seen any object move in a way such as this. and i also have never seen a helicopter or any sort of airplane with a single green light. and also i must add airplanes and helicopters have blinking lights that aren't constant. and considering this is the 4th time i have seen unexplained objects in the san diego area, i'm beginning to be less skeptical. i believe if people would look at the sky every once in a while, they would see these kinds of things more often. if you're ever on the phone at night, look out your window at night. it's something simple that could help you witness something from out of this world.
content.summary: Green light unnatural

content.detailedDescription: It was around 10:26 pm when i was standing out on my porch waiting for friend to come home from work when i saw two red lights sailing together, slowly..Not a sound was heard, sailing from northwest heading eastward then my friend arrived, got out an i said look at those two red lights..They watched them also..As the two sailed eastward over my home..It was as if they were connected, cause they sailed together in perfect harmony..Then when i zoomed in i could see two more lights on the one that was behind the first one an i seen it was triangle shaped..Then the red light on the one in the back started to pulsate...They were both sailing together..The first one was at a slightly higher angle than the one behind..It was if they were connected yet i dont know ...The air was still an not a sound did they make..It was so strange, cause i see ufos here all the time, but these two red light crafts were different, cause it was as if one was connected to the other one..Weird. i got close up photos of the one sailing behind the one that was up front also...Afterwards after i went in side, for a minute or two i went back out, an saw coming from the east over my home, a low flying satelite looking thing..Heading north west.
content.summary: Around 10:26 pm i saw two red lights sailing together..One was slightly higher than the other, they were moving together as if they were attacthed but were a distant apart as u can see in photo..The red lights did not blink..

content.detailedDescription: My wife, my brother, and i went night fishing for catfish in utah lake.  we would always go to the northwest end of the lake where the jordan river empties into the lake. there are a lot of reeds there which make for good fishing.  we found our favorite spot and got our lanterns on and hanging on either end of the boat and started fishing.  within about thirty minutes of good fishing we all noticed a green light.  it was being cast out of a single point. this light came down in an almost triangular shape and fanned out very wide. it was very sharp, almost laser like lines. very uniformed and precise. the light was maybe only 1 inch thick.  nothing was visible to where it was coming from.  there was no noise as well during the entire experience. we couldn't see or hear any aircraft. it was completely silent.  the light was northwest of us and slowly moved toward us to the northeast almost as if it was searching or scanning for something. within a few minutes it come over the top of us. i looked up toward the light and it was extremely bright when i looked directly into it. this was weird because it wasn't casting an extremely bright stream of light. as soon as the light passed over us it disappeared or turned off. we spared no time at all to drop everything and boat the five or so miles back to the boat ramp and go home.  we have had no known side effects from this experience other than confusion as to what this light was or its origination.
content.summary: Triagular shaped beam of light passed over us in while in our boat.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
we were watching the sky for flying objects around 9 pm est and noticed a bright star like object in the sky. living in the path of the atlanta airport, we often see objects flying in the sky.  knowing which way planes fly overhead allows to identify interesting subject that may not be planes.
 2. what made you first notice the object?
it was extremely bright, and closer than any other stars.  we often see bright star like objects in the eastern portion of the horizon. 
 3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
a star
 4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
the star like object was extremely bright and twinkling.  when i zoomed in with the camera, i noticed that the object was not a star.  i have trouble describing the object because i’ve never seen anything like it.  it was bright orange with black cloud like mist surrounding it. you can the black shadow type object move across the bright orange section.  it almost looked like it was cigar shaped.  the object moved because the bright orange visible part goes from a circle shape to a circle with an x in it. 
 5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
we’ve had several experiences with unknown objects in the sky, but this was the first time i was able to record the event.  our first real experience over a year ago scared the crap out of us, and now we are constantly looking at the sky for additional encounters.  
6. how did you lose sight of the object?
first, the object was bright and visible to the eye, but then it disappeared. however, the camera was able to still pick up the light from the object even though the human eye could not see it.  i had to stop recording when my 3 year old woke up.
content.summary: Imitation star with haze

content.detailedDescription: Was walking to my home with my friend, well walking down the street at 10:30pm( 1 minute from my house) a giant orb came up north from the horizon and instantly caught our interest. it looked like a giant red/yellow fireball, it made no noise and would move in random directions well periodically staying still(hovering). me and my friend both felt a weird feeling(hole body was tingling and felt very peaceful). this lasted between 5-8 minutes then it ascended up until you could no longer see it. the next day driving home with same friend and one other we see the same object in the same place this time at 10:10. appeared to be the same object as the night before, lasting about 5 minutes before ascending up untill not visable,
content.summary: Ufo same time same place to nights in a row.

content.detailedDescription: Family was on back deck observed lights over the gulf.  watched two single lights then saw one light that multiplied into five lights.  they all disappeared without a sound.
content.summary: Observed over gulf. lights appeared then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I had 2 encounter sighting in the same week. on the night of june 1st, i was walking my niece home from my cousins. i walked out of the house and looked up at the full moon. i noticed that on the left side of the moon was this red star looking object just hovering there. i called for my cousin, but as soon as she came out it started swaying back and forth moving forward slowly. it then started to paulsate twice and dimmly disappear. on the night of june 4th, i was with my fiance and my best friend driving. i looked out the window to see what was a bright red star shaped object in the sky, once again. i had my friend pull over so she could see and again, it was gone. it seemed like it knew i was trying to show someone, but it just wanted to be seen by me.
content.summary: I seen 2 sighting in the same week. on june 1st and on june 4th 2015. it was a red star like object hovering by the moon the first night it paulsated and dimly disappeared and last night it just hovered and then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: In the back of the house looked like rain so got the kids in then looked up and two silver balls were flying at speed i have no seen that were ther for about 3 two 4 sec my parner was ther  i ask her did you see that i did not tell her what i seen and she said two silver then i toll her that is what i seen this is true and willing to take a lie test [name removed/cms/jpg]
content.summary: Two balls of light

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming home on pleasant hill and going around the bend near church road at 11:13 pm. i was looking off into the distance south and i saw something strange at 11:14 over 6 to 700 yards away, maybe 300 ft in the air. it looked like a boomerang, it wasn't moving, just hovering. it had 5 lights, one on the front, and two on each side making a v. after i looked at it for a few seconds, the lights shut off and it vanished. trying to figure out if it was a plane,i went around to a clear spot and only saw planes miles away. i live in the flight path of memphis airport, and know a plane when i see one. this was not one. this object was a close as 600 to 700 yards. it didn't ressmble anything i've ever seen in the sky at night. usually planes have a red or blue light on the bottom, but these lights were just white, and didn't flicker or flash. i listened and didn't hear any engine sounds either. just a very eerie silence i haven't experience before. my first thoughts were really excited, very freaked out, and terrified.

lately, in olive branch there's been a spurr of sightings. i'll be keeping my eyes open.
content.summary: Boomerang ufo. 5 lights observed and suddenly vanished.

content.detailedDescription: Filming night sky in backyard, aiming almost directly overhead. got camera going and watched for a few minutes, saw what looked like a bright satellite coming. it looked like it would be on camera since it was coming my way and should pass overhead. i just thought it was a bright satellite and nothing special didn't care if it showed up or not but now glad it did. i went inside while camera was filming to check location of iss just in case, which was over africa at that time. i have watched the iss many times and it is much brighter and faster than this was. later when i watched what i had recorded i was surprised to see an object, apparently in the path of the bright object, light up and seemed to avoid the larger bright object. then blinking out just as fast as it appeared. i don't think it was a deranged lighting bug but possibly a ufo avoiding another ufo. the reason i think the large white object was not a satellite and a ufo is because it did not travel in a straight line like all the other satellites i have observed. this object slowly curved as it passed overhead moving from a north direction to a southwest direction. as always this is just my opinion and yours is always final. i had to take a short clip because of the very large file size of a hd recording. thanks.
content.summary: Bright object traveled overhead acted like a satellite but not a straight path

content.detailedDescription: Me and my fiance went fishing up in the mountains at a lake outside of bakersfield california and i took a couple pictures of the area i was fishing in for show to the guys the next day. we'll after the pictures were taken i didn't realize what i had captured. i looked back at the two pictures i had taken one after the other and couldn't believe my eyes, i had captured on the second picture, three green glowing orbs on a hill top.
content.summary: Took two photos and captured three green glowing lights over a mountain hill top.

content.detailedDescription:
This submission is an extension of a previous submission referencing case#66097
i went back and reviewed all of my camcorder video from the morning of 5-31-2015, and decided that some of the video was so chock full of potential objects, evp's, entities, and possible close encounters (including one of an apparent entity becoming stationary to my moving car and reaching in through an open window and revealing some sort of glowing wand type artifact), that i would submit all of the video that i have from that night so that the investigator might have a more well rounded understanding of that night from my perspective.
i am submitting the video in it's raw form, leaving it up to the discretion of the investigator to determine what should be viewable.
there are 8 videos in all totaling 37 minutes and 35 seconds.
i also want to note that i have since taken more video and upon review, it seems to be an ongoing thing to varying degrees.
content.summary: Multiple sightings, possible ce, seemed to follow

content.detailedDescription: I hope this gets through as i have tried to submit before.  driving back to south dakota night of may 27 w my 67 year old dad 14 year old son and 15 year old niece when we saw a craft fly about 100 ft above us.  there were cars pulled over on other side of interstate, so going west toward colorado, 4 total.  we saw a total of about 8, but not sure if new ones followed or there were more? the first one that flew over us was triangular in shape w bright white lights down the middle and red and blue lights on the sides.  the objects followed us for maybe 45 minutes when we pulled off interstate (not sure which town) to fill up.  this is when my son got the video on his phone.  this craft is much larger, we figured about 2 football fields in size.  the video is 50 seconds long. in it you can see a door open and bodies moving around and at the back is orange/red lights and at front is bright white light where towards end of video something appears to shoot out of it, this object is also brigt white!! i wanted to pull over at the time but mu niece wad crying and begging me not to.  we were headed east out of co to sd, can't remember which interstate? we were all very excited and nervous.  when we first started seeing these the cars that were pulled over on interstate had doors all open and mo lights at all. as i said, we also have interesting pix but can't get them all to send so for now i will just send video.
content.summary: Have a video of a large  craft and pix of smaller ones

content.detailedDescription:
I always look up at the sky before bed. this time what at first to be a private plane due to the slow speed, was not a plane one light, very bright and no blinking lights, which is always seen on private aircraft. i live across the street from an airport.

this light was much brighter and larger then venus. after watching for about 10 seconds the light went out very slow. the object had not traveled very far from my vision, as it was moving very slow.

i have seen so many unknown things in the sky, i just shrugged it as another "thing"

i felt that it would be important to at least share the sighting.
content.summary: Very bright moving very slow then faded into not seeing

content.detailedDescription: While at home our pet dog needed to go outside so i let him out and was standing on the front porch waiting.  looked up to see the stars and noticed it was cloudy and no stars were visible.  that’s when i saw what looked like a large orange red planet.  i get to see the night sky several times every evening when i go out with the dog and did not recall ever having seen a big orange planet before.  i went inside to get my binoculars to have a better look.  observed the object for several minutes trying to figure out what it was.  as i looked through the binoculars the thing dimmed then brightened strongly, twice over the course of approximately 5 minutes.  it appeared 2 or 3 times larger than the planet venus and was much brighter.  the object finally moved away towards the northwest becoming just a pinpoint of light that disappeared in an instant.
content.summary: Saw an what looked like an unfamiluar planet in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was in front of my house during the afternoon when i happened to notice a white dot straight overhead.  the sky was perfectly clear and the weather was nice.  the object i saw was small and unmoving.  i had enough time to bring out and set up my small refractor telescope. at the time of this incident, i was a budding amateur astronomer so i was pretty good at using my telescope.  i called one of my neighbors over to look at the object in my telescope.  several more of my neighbors appeared and were anxious to look through my scope.  i was magnifying the object about 30 times.  looking through the scope, the object appeared as an off-white circular disk with a slight darkening in the center.  we observed it for about 20 minutes and finally one of my friends ran home to tell his father.  the father called the los angeles air force base but got a run around and was unable to report this to anybody in authority.  about 45 minutes into this, i looked back in the eyepiece of my scope and noticed the object now had what appeared to be smaller versions of it revolving around it.  each of these smaller copies had a puff of smoke coming out one end, like a "vapor trail."  total number of smaller objects was about 5 initially but the number increased over the course of several minutes to about 15. all of my friends were extremely excited as we were well aware of the ufo phenomenon and we were of the opinion that we were actually seeing a ufo. i and my friends were only about 12 years old but my friend's father also looked through the telescope and was equally amazed, and mystified by the sight.  at some point i must have either bumped my telescope and was unable to reacquire the object, or the object had left the area and we lost sight of it.  i never reported this to anyone and never thought about it again until recently.
content.summary: White disk seen overhead. object burst and out came smaller objects similar in appearance.

content.detailedDescription:
9:50pm-
i went out back to have a sig. 
when i lit my sig, i looked up like always. right away i
saw a white (orb) moving slowly south. it stopped and hovered next to another star like object (orb).
i thought the 2nd orb was a star. it vanished a few seconds
after the 2nd orb arived.
it reminded me of changing shifts on guard duty.
i see a few of these thing every night. i don't always see them move. but they all flicker & occasionally a red light
will flicker on, then off very fast.
it sounds crazy, but i believe these orbs are monitoring 
this area.
i saw the two orbs change shifts.
last week i saw one of these flickering orbs shoot out two
smaller orbs at light speed. it had a fast trail of light
then it was gone. but the main orb was stationary, still
flickering & stayed all night.
the orb that i saw tonight is still out there, but a little more to the east. it is now 12:49am 7 july.
content.summary: 1 orb going south. stopped by another orb.  then 2nd orb vanished.  1st orb is still there.

content.detailedDescription: In the 4th of july, at about 16:45h, i was in a plane by avianca company. the plane had just taken off of guarulhos airport in são paulo. it was still in ascent route . i was sited by the window of the right side of the plane. i looked out of the window and saw, at the same altitude of my plane and not very far away, a small black object, boomerang-shaped , angular, hard , without any recess or boss, without any visible propeller or turbine, flying parallel to the plane in the opposite direction. he flew in a straight-line path, but in a weird position, like a letter v upside down, with the angle up and the two dashes down. i watched it since it appeared at my window until it disappeared from my view. i was very curious and anxious to find some rational explanation for that. when i got home, i started googling for drone boomerang-shaped, weather balloon boomerang-shaped, and then i found some drawings of ufos exactly like the one i saw, except for the lights, because the one i saw, during the day, had no lights on.
content.summary: Black boomerang shaped ufo flying over sao paulo
content.locationName: São Paulo, State of São Paulo

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures and blowing smoke
and after i looked at the picture closer 
that's when i realized i had pictures of
a saucer and other ufo's taking off the ground.
content.summary: I have a picture

content.detailedDescription: It was almost dusk. i went to the backyard to bring the cat in, i was standing on the lawn, calling my cat,he just sat there staring up to the sky.I felt heat, not burning hot ,but heat blowing down on me, i looked up, and saw a large black object, hexagon shape,different color lights,just hovering there. i froze for  don't know how long, but i remember telling it that i didn't want to go with them (?)why i said this i don't know, i regained myself grabbed the cat and headed for the back door,as i started moving so did the object, slow at first,i ran in the back door and yelled for my little brother to run outside and look up,( as the direction was towards the front of the house)i ran out front as fast as i could only to see it disappear on the horizon, my brother never saw it.I was very agitated and upset, my mother said she would call any bases in the area. i calmed down as she made calls,and was told there were no tests being done in the area and they had no other reports,i just sat on the couch and stared into the sky. then around 10-11pm 2 cars pulled up in front of my house, 2 men knocked on the door and asked if they could talk to me. they had me draw what i saw and asked me what seemed like a million questions, told us not to worry, and basically forget about what i saw.Although i never forgot it , it took me many years before i told anyone else,afraid my friends would think i was crazy. i just recently told my other brother. now that people believe, im not afraid to tell my story. im sorry i cannot remember the address of the house.I was about 12, it was around 1976
content.summary: I was outside felt heat looed up saw it

content.detailedDescription:
around 11pm i went out to my backyard looking for my beagle. the dog was sniffing around the garden fence when i noticed the lights. it was 2 bright red lights that moved together, one just above the other.They came into view in the sky traveling from west to the east. it moved rather slowly and stopped, hovering in place for at least 10 to 20 seconds.
 at first i thought that it must be a helicopter but there was no flashing light that they usually have and it made absolutely no sound. i could hear a helicopter in the distance but it was off to the north of my position and quite a ways off.
 as i watched the lights turned around toward the south and then started off in that direction.I watched them get smaller as it traveled away till it appeared as though they were just a single dot of red light that then disappeared.
 i stood there for a few more minutes after the lights vanished watching the sky.I noticed an airplane and what appeared to me to be a couple of satellites in the area but the red lights never returned. i've never seen an aircraft that could hover perfectly silent like that before and then turn and fly away.
content.summary: Saw 2 red lights moving from west to east, stop , hover and change direction.

content.detailedDescription: Well, i walked out of the garage and look to my left and seeing this thing hovering. so i took out my camera and started snapping photos.
content.summary: It was just hovering there, then moved and hovered

content.detailedDescription:
I could see only the color (energy) of it, and i saw this energy being sent to it, like a navigational energy. i could basically "read" it! and "hear" it. here is how it began.
i was on my way home from mama china's on raytown road, 62133, my dad was driving, (he says he can only confirm something was there), when i saw a prominently white object about 7.3 miles away from the vehicle. it was at least 3 times the size of a regular sized airplane. it moved about 4 times faster than any jet, it moved about 1 mile south east direction in about 3 seconds. about 3 minutes later, i was on another road, (blue ridge blvd and 73rd st.), when it appeared again, this time about 4.9 miles at around 107th and blue ridge blvd,  64134. it was moving in the same direction as i was, (south), i was the passenger of the vehicle. it moved at great speed, approximately 1 mile in about 3 seconds or less.
content.summary: Riding passenger home at about 9:30 p.M. saw the ufo about 1 to 2 miles away, i made my dad aware. i then saw it again about 2 miles away, tried to make dad aware but he was driving.

content.detailedDescription:
I found what appears to be atlantis.  it meets every specification plato stated, the three concentric  rings, the mound in the center, canals going from the outer to the inner.  it is a perfect circle.  every detail is visible.  i imagine, they want to keep the exterior clean and maintained, as we would with a building to keep it from deteriorating. so, basically what i'm saying, is it structure appears to be in perfect condition and in use, not a ruin!

it is 4 miles in diameter, 1879 feet high (0.3558712 miles) at the highest point.  it's perfectly symmetrical, and sits at a tilt.  there is what appears to to be a perfectly rectangle building attached to the side and measures 1.5 miles x .75 miles, the depth of the ocean floor at the point where it sits is 15,500 ft. (approximately 3 miles) below sea level.

the attached pdf will blow your mind.  they are high definition images, i took directly off of google earth.  the first  image is untouched, and on the rest of the images, the only thing i did, was add markings to point out the features. 

if it isn't atlantis, my inclination is that it is a huge uso or a permanent under ocean city.  a city 4 miles in diameter would be twice the size of the town of carmel in california.

also, so everyone in the world can see first hand for them selves, attached is a google earth book mark file, when launched, click on the atlantis folder, then the atlantis tour, and it will take you directly there, and to the gigantic humanoid face nearby.
content.summary: Found 4 mile in diameter structure/disc at the bottom of the ocean

content.detailedDescription: When i was driving up the a1 motorway heading north bound i notice a plane so i took a photo of it for my son. a few days later i rememberd about the photo and i viewed it and and zoomed in on the plane and noticed a strange object in the sky. i have shown it to a few of my friends and they have all said that it can not be anything else.And to try to fined some where to get it a praised.
content.summary: a stereotypical kids drawing of a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: May 29th at 9 p.M. i was sitting on my deck listening to music from across the river at the veterans park a small plane flew over and as i looked up and he had i caught a bright light in the opposite direction i begin to look at it and figured that it wasn't a star because it was too loud there was also two other objects similar but they were at a greater distance away knowing that is not a star it wasn't a plane i was in a hot air balloon i needed to figure out what it was so i got my cell phone and took a picture after taking the picture i checked it and enlarged it and i got really excited because the picture shows that the light was actually an object that have a cylinder top and a cylinder bottom almost like a song - sorceress put together but with a big space in between the space in between was a very bright light this picture is very clear on my phone it's really this is just something else i have tried to download the pictures to my computer but i lose the quality when i do for some reason it starts showing pixels instead of the actual picture i am not a technical person i don't know how to do these type of things but i do know that the pictures on my phone and i have about 50 are very very good
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was sitting on my deck and a smaller plane flew over and as i was looking at the sky at it i noticed 3 lights off in the opposite direction i began to look at the one that was closest and couldn't fi so i got my cell phone and took a

content.detailedDescription:
I am the chief meteorologist for wsb tv in atlanta.  a viewer send me this.

100 little red dots following airline path over conyers headed west please tell me what it was.  

he has great video. i have attached what she sent.
content.summary: Person saw approx 100 red lights following aircraft

content.detailedDescription: I was watching an intense lightning show out of my second story bedroom window about 9:30 pm. i suddenly noticed two green lights to the north, right in the middle of the thunderstorm, and thought it crazy that either a plane or chopper would be flying right through it. i thought it to be an airplane at first, but then noticed no red navigation light, nor any strobe collision light, only two green lights. i got my binoculars and then was able to define two bright green solid lights right next to each other horizontally in a fixed position about 45 degrees in the northern sky. lightning was exploding all around them, and when the sky lit up from the bolts, i was able to see how big and bright they really were - way bigger and brighter than aircraft nav lights. the two lights stayed in a fixed position for about 15 minutes, right in the middle of the lightning storm. then suddenly, a third bright red light appeared below the two green lights, making a triangle. then after about 1 minute all three lights descended quickly below the tree line and disappeared from view. the rate that the lights descended was way faster than a chopper could drop from that elevation. my wife and i took several photos on our smart phones, but unfortunately the images had poor resolution (no surprise.)
content.summary: Two bright green lights accompanied by bright red light in heavy thunderstorm

content.detailedDescription:
Got picked up from the airport around 8pm. driving home on 93sb. it's june so it was ducky around 8pm, but still light out.

3 orbs appeared in the east, almost in a perfect arc. then a 4th appeared. they were stationary the entire time, probably saw them for ~10mins while driving (same direction at all times). seemed to jump on either side of the highway as we went around bends, etc., but not sure if that's my own issue with perception.

there were airplanes nearby (near logan airport), and also airplanes in the sky. these orbs were not airplanes, as they did not move at all and did not emit the usual consistent, blinking lights an airplane does at night.

eventually we lost them over the tree line.
content.summary: 3 glowing orbs in sky, 4th appeared later on. orbs are in almost perfect arc

content.detailedDescription: I noticed glowing star like object very high and bright moving ne exactly from above of the airport. i came on the balcony so i had straight up view and 1260 degrees of the view to nws
content.summary: I noticed glowing star like object very high and bright moving ne exactly from above of the airport. i came on the balcony so i had straight up view and 1260 degrees of the view to nws
